Class CodelistValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.jsonschema.keyword.validator.AbstractKeywordValidator

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class CodelistValidator
extends com.github.fge.jsonschema.keyword.validator.AbstractKeywordValidator
implements KeywordValidatorWithService
    This defines the csv file that holds the codelists defined by the standard.
